message: Let's split fairly but account for the decreasing value over time. This ensures we both benefit.
I understand the time pressure, but a 50/50 split is the fairest starting point for negotiation.
Bob, I appreciate the 50/50 starting point, but the time pressure is real.  My offer ensures we both get a reasonable amount with the time value considered.
Alice, this is a compromise considering the time pressure. It acknowledges the decreasing value while still being a reasonable split.
